title: Lullaby

description: Minor edit: possibly fixed the lyrics.
title: Lullaby

description:
Tabbed almost entirely by ear; additionally studied a few live performances of the song to identify the chords, techniques and whatnot.
This tab is meant to be "hyperrealistic", i.e. faithfully recreate the studio recording with great attention to detail.
There is a ton of improvisation on the guitar, so unless you really want to meticulously mimic the studio version, I advise to treat this tab as more of a "musical documentation", if you will. That being said, I have never even played guitar, so some parts might (and most likely do) have a more practical way of being played.
I will naturally make corrections if need be.

Note: I created the tab using TuxGuitar and converting the TG file to GP5 spawned a few unwanted changes... I will try to come up with a solution to that ASAP.
title: Lullaby
